game.title: Rats in the Cellar
game.objective: Exterminate the rats in the cellar of the abandoned house.
game.description: The local villagers have been complaining about the rats in the cellar of the abandoned house. They have asked you to get rid of them.

task.objective: Find the entrance to the cellar.
task.description: The entrance to the cellar is hidden behind a loose stone in the foundation of the house.

task.objective: Kill the rats in the cellar.
task.description: There are several rats in the cellar. Be careful, they can be aggressive.

task.objective: Return to Mayor Abigail and collect your reward.
task.description: Once you have killed all the rats, return to Mayor Abigail to collect your reward.
